section.section: An insurer shall provide a policyholder with an annual statement that summarizes the coverages and exclusions under the policy issued by the insurer.
The insurer's statement shall be clear and specific.
The insurer's statement shall state whether the coverages under the policy provide for replacement cost, actual cash value, or other method of loss payment for covered structures and contents.

text.section:
The statement under subsection (a) of this section:
is not part of the policy or contract of insurance; and
does not create a private right of action.
The Commissioner may adopt regulations to implement the provisions of this section.
